name: PuppetHeart
description:
PuppetHeart

You are trapped in an old school building. A Letter from an unknown person... maybe it tells you what to do?

Controlls: 

Movement: WASD

Inventory/Menu:  Left ALT

Throw: Left Mouse Button

Interact:  E

Good luck and have fun!

Can you get free?

-----

I will not work further on this Project.

This was made for a very nice Person and his Stream. I hope he likes it!

Cheers Thetra
